snippet: A Spanish-language telenovela version of “Breaking Bad” called “Metastasis” was posted on Hulu and is having a broadcast run on UniMás.
abstract: Mike Hale Critic's Notebook notes that Metastasis, Spanish-language version of television show Breaking Bad, is episode-for-episode, practically shot-for-shot remake of original show; Metastasis is available for viewing on Hulu at same time that it is having broadcast run on UniMas.
lead_paragraph: A Spanish-language telenovela version of “Breaking Bad” called “Metastasis” was posted on Hulu and is having a broadcast run on UniMás.

headline.print_headline: Walter White, Meet Walter Blanco: It’s the Same Story, With a Different Desert
headline.seo: ‘Metastasis,’ a Spanish-Language Version of ‘Breaking Bad,’ Debuts
headline.main: Walter White, Meet Walter Blanco: It’s the Same Story, With a Different Desert
